analysis:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Crypto treasury names experienced further declines.
• The decline is influenced by increased scrutiny from Nasdaq.
• Broader market conditions and investor sentiment contributed to the downturn.

**Why it matters**
• Investors should monitor regulatory developments and Nasdaq's actions, as these can significantly impact market valuations and investment strategies in crypto treasury assets.
• Builders need to be aware of increased regulatory oversight to ensure compliance and adapt business models accordingly.

**Risks**
• Increased regulatory scrutiny may lead to decreased market participation and liquidity.

**Opportunities**
• Companies that prioritize compliance and transparency may attract more institutional investment.

**Market view**
Market — Crypto treasury names are under pressure due to regulatory concerns and market sentiment.

**Sources**
https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2025/09/04/crypto-treasury-names-hammered-further-as-nasdaq-reportedly-ups-scrutiny

────────────────────────────────
